testsuite.name: TicTacToeTest
testsuite.system-out:
?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Enter the first player's name (Player1 by default) > First player's name: Player1 Enter the second player's name (Player2 by default) > Second player's name: Player2 Enter the field size (3x3 by default) > Field size: 3x3 |---|---|---|-y | | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | x Enter Player1's move as (x,y) ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Enter the first player's name (Player1 by default) > Artem First player's name: Artem Enter the second player's name (Player2 by default) > Lollipop Second player's name: Lollipop Enter the field size (3x3 by default) > 2x5 Field size: 2x5 |---|---|---|---|---|-y | | | | | | |---|---|---|---|---| | | | | | | |---|---|---|---|---| | x Enter Artem's move as (x,y) ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Enter the first player's name (Player1 by default) > First player's name: Player1 Enter the second player's name (Player2 by default) > Mary Second player's name: Mary Enter the field size (3x3 by default) > 2x2 Field size: 3x3 |---|---|---|-y | | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | x Enter Player1's move as (x,y) ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m Enter the first player's name (Player1 by default) > First player's name: Player1 Enter the second player's name (Player2 by default) > Second player's name: Player2 Enter the field size (3x3 by default) > Field size: 3x3 |---|---|---|-y | | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | x Enter Player1's move as (x,y) > (2,1) |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | X | | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---|
Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > (2,1) Wrong move entered Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > (,1) Wrong move entered Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > sdfsdfs Wrong move entered Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > (100,2) Wrong move entered Enter Player2's move as (x,y) > (2,2) |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---| | | | | |---|---|---|

Enter Player1's move as (x,y) > (3,1) |---|---|---| | X | | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---| | X | O | | |---|---|---| Player1 wins! ?[1;31m Start test 5?[0m Enter the first player's name (Player1 by default) > Biba First player's name: Biba Enter the second player's name (Player2 by default) > Boba Second player's name: Boba Enter the field size (3x3 by default) > 1x10 Field size: 1x10 |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|-y | | | | | | | | | | | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | x Enter Biba's move as (x,y) > (1,1) |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | X | | | | | | | | | | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|

Enter Boba's move as (x,y) > (1,8) |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | X | X | | X | | | | O | O | O | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| Boba wins! ?[1;31m Start test 6?[0m Enter the first player's name (Player1 by default) > Max First player's name: Max Enter the second player's name (Player2 by default) > Emily Second player's name: Emily Enter the field size (3x3 by default) > 8x1 Field size: 8x1 |---|-y | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | x Enter Max's move as (x,y) > (1,1) |---| | X | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---| | | |---|
